channel.title: [508] How to speed up a weapon?
channel.description:
How do I speed up a weapon in a 508 server.
I want to speed up the Saradomin Sword (11730)
But I don't know how.
I've been asking a fair few questions lately; but it's for a good cause.
Thanks in advance :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 05:22:43 am[/size][hr]Does anyone know?

item.title: [508] How to speed up a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @drumandy drumandy
item.description:
@drumandy wrote:

How exactly do I do that?..
where is the file? :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:58:30 am[/size][hr]No worries: It’s in the Players/Items/Player Weapons of Pali’s base.

Thanks anyway

Read full topic
